messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: The inves1igation was in full swing when Detective Harlan entered the coffee-stained briefing room. Amid the chaos, Lieutenant G0mez directed the officers to various locations, ensuring that all leads were being pursued. Officer L3slie and Officer Callum had already been dispatched to canvass the neighborhood, while Sergeant V3squ3z was coordinating with the forensics team. A report from Technician Alvarado indicated that there might be a significant fingerprint 0n the murder weapon, and Coroner Dr. Ochoa was on the scene, examining the body for clues. Patrol Officer Morales took detailed notes, her pen flying across the notepad as she recorded every detail that Detective Sergeant Trent was mentioning. The Criminalist, named Dr. Bishop, was analyzing the blood splatter patterns, hoping to piece together the sequence of events. Overhearing this, Coroner's Technician Spencer immediately relayed the information to Deputy Milton, who was guarding the perimeter to prevent evidence contamination. Captain Ramirez, overseeing the operation, commended the team for their diligence and reminded everyone of the importance of securing accurate evidence.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Detective HarlanOfficer Context: Entered the briefing room where the investigation was being coordinated.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Lieutenant GomezOfficer Context: Directed officers to various locations during the investigation.Officer Role: LieutenantOfficer Name: Officer LeslieOfficer Context: Dispatched to canvass the neighborhood as part of the investigation.Officer Role: OfficerOfficer Name: Officer CallumOfficer Context: Also dispatched to canvass the neighborhood alongside Officer Leslie.Officer Role: OfficerOfficer Name: Sergeant VasquezOfficer Context: Coordinated with the forensics team regarding the investigation.Officer Role: SergeantOfficer Name: Technician AlvaradoOfficer Context: Reported a potential significant fingerprint on the murder weapon.Officer Role: TechnicianOfficer Name: Dr. OchoaOfficer Context: Examined the body for clues at the crime scene.Officer Role: CoronerOfficer Name: Patrol Officer MoralesOfficer Context: Took detailed notes during the briefing led by Detective Sergeant Trent.Officer Role: Patrol OfficerOfficer Name: Detective Sergeant TrentOfficer Context: Mentioning details during the briefing, which Patrol Officer Morales noted down.Officer Role: Detective SergeantOfficer Name: Dr. BishopOfficer Context: Analyzing blood splatter patterns to understand the sequence of events.Officer Role: CriminalistOfficer Name: Technician SpencerOfficer Context: Relayed information to Deputy Milton about the blood splatter patterns.Officer Role: Coroner's TechnicianOfficer Name: Deputy MiltonOfficer Context: Guarded the perimeter to prevent evidence contamination.Officer Role: DeputyOfficer Name: Captain RamirezOfficer Context: Commended the team for their diligence and reminded them of the importance of securing accurate evidence.Officer Role: Captain
